name: ddx-log
description: An example DDX app using authentication and API services.

scripts.staging: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-production.json)" -p 'App - Staging' && modulus deploy -f -p 'App - Staging'
scripts.production: modulus env set METEOR_SETTINGS "$(cat settings-production.json)" -p 'App - Production' && modulus deploy -f -p 'App - Production'
